reviews.text: This is the first hotel I've stayed in which provides comlimentary condoms - and it certainly made a good talking point with colleagues in the bar of this trendy boutique hotel. The location is excellent, right in the city centre not far from the station.
reviews.title: Very good, but.....

reviews.text: My room was one of the three penthouses on the sixth floor so it was well away from the noise of the city below. It was also a lovely, spacious room with all the normal things one would expect for €320 a night, including an outstanding shower. The windows covered about 60%
reviews.title: A find

reviews.text: of the walls and therefore the room was extremely bright, adding to the feeling of spaciousness. The views are tremendous.
reviews.title: Eh

likes.disliked: — Rooms were mediocre at best and amenities minimal

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unfortunately, there were a few shortcomings which let the hotel down
reviews.title: Clean hotel near train station

reviews.text: a bit. First, I was woken early by noise outside the bedroom door which didn't subside for more than half an hour - I couldn't work out
reviews.title: Great hotel, great location, very helpful staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My spouse and I spent five nights here in late October, and it was a complete delight. The hotel is extremely well-located at Karlsplatz, easily accessible from the S-Bahn. Small but very elegant, the hotel served as a perfect location for a good visit to Munich.
reviews.title: Friendly, upscale hotel with a great location

reviews.text: The rooms are extremely comfortable, generously sized and well-furnished. The bathrooms are state of the art, and quite slick. Our non-smoking room showed no signs of any smoke aroma, although the hallways occasionally seemed to reveal a faint hint of smoke. That was not in any way distracting.
reviews.title: Great find, perfect location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Yes, the mini-bar is free. Yes, the hotel's Wi-Fi is also free. We (2 PCs!) encountered a problem on connection to the DHCP server, but reception quickly provided fixed IP addresses.
reviews.title: Great hotel - good value. Would recommend.
Great decor, shame about the noise and smell!
reviews.text: Although I speak good enough German, the reception staff and the staff in the restaurant all had more than adequate command of English. They were all exceedingly friendly and responsive. The only burden was the lack of in-room safe, requiring constant envelope-filling and signing, etc.

reviews.title: Boutique in the centre
reviews.text: The breakfast in the dining room was top-notch. Wide array of excellent croissants, Brötchen, cheeses, meats, fruits, juices, etc. Plus cappuccino and lattes.
